page.title: 13CHALK DOWNLAND FLORA
page.content: The{Wild Mignonette}has tall spikes of tiny pale yellow flowers. This plant is related to the Sweet Mignonette of the garden. {Salad Burnet}has a round, purplish head and no petals. The stamens appear near the bottom of the flower head and the red styles are found on the top. Salad Burnet has toothed leaves and flowers in between June and August. The leaves of Salad Burnet were used as an ingredient in drinks and in the salad bowl. They have a flavour like cucumber. {Kidney Vetch}is popularly known as{Lady's Fingers.}Its bluish leaves are covered with silky hairs and so are the yellow blossoms. Kidney Vetch flowers in between June and August.
